name: SpellBound (itch) (256 Bits Studio, vp256bits)
description:
Be one of the many to try SpellBound.

Our new standalone SpellBound, built from the ground up for Windows, Mobile & Console platforms, are coming and we need your help to test it!

 We’re still in the early stages of development, but we wanted to give you an early look at what we’re working on. We’re eager to get player feedback and gather technical information on how the game performs.

This is your chance to help us shape the future of this amazing new game.
